data.name: Pagans Must Die
data.detailed_description:
You are part of a fanatic Christian heresy called "The Order of the Sword of Jesus" that is
well known for its violence against heathens. You are also stranded on an island full of pagans...
What are you going to do? Embrace the evil or search for redemption, be friendly or hostile,
kill or spare the life of your opponents: the choice is yours.

Key Features

  • Interactive dialog: some options will lead to physical confrontations while others to a pacific resolution.
  • Spare the life of your opponents or kill them: the choice is yours(It can affect the story).
  • Dynamic party: depending on your choices you might end up with different companions, or even alone.
  • Classic turn based combat.
  • 4 different endings: bad ending, pagan ending, christian ending and evil ending.
  • Hand drawn 2d graphics.
  • Native 2K and 4k sprites and backgrounds.
  • 21:9 support.
  • Two quick save slots with f5, f6(yeah, I hate when pc games don't have them, lol).
